resources.string: You can call the hotline number (09643207003) to get medical treatment for your animal through the customer service officer or by filling out the initial patient information form by yourself. Then you can make payment from your own bKash account with the counter number received on your mobile or by clicking on the link received. You can pay with the counter number from the personal number of any bKash agent. Our service price is Tk.200 per cow / buffalo, Tk.100 per goat / sheep; The service price for each batch of chicken, duck, turkey, quail etc. is Tk. 500, dog, cat, rabbit Tk.500 each, birds Tk.100 each and other animals Tk.500 each. You can also find out the information of the service from our Facebook or website.

You can fill and submit the consultancy information form yourself from the service receiving form to take the consultancy service of your animal or you can fill and submit it through the customer service officer by calling hotline (09643207003).Then you can make payment from your bKash / Rocket / Cash or by clicking on the link received with the counter number received on your mobile. Or you can make payment with the counter number from the personal number of any bKash / rocket / cash agent. Our consultancy service prices are divided into two categories, one-time and yearly.

The country\'s first government-approved online veterinary hospital has launched a special service called \'Registered Farm Service\'. The service will specifically help a farmer to build a profitable farm through proper farm management. A farm needs scientific accommodation, quality rations, breeding decisions / planning, production and storage of green grass, routine wise vaccination and deworming, proper daily care, cure, disease prevention and treatment and production and marketing of quality products etc. You can ensure all these things through the farm registration service. Proper management is the main controller of the implementation of the goals and objectives of the farm. Management is an art or technique that combines farm resources, decisions, opportunities and time to make it profitable. We do farm mainly for production. Production refers to milk, meat, eggs, chicks, and fur. Farm registration to ensure this production!
